newsitem.title: USA: Sterling Software wins U.S. GSA contract.
newsitem.headline: Sterling Software wins U.S. GSA contract.

text.p: DALLAS, April 2, 1997 - Sterling Software Inc said on Wednesday it Federal Systems Group has won a three-year schedule contract under a new professional services program from the U.S. General Services Administration, the purchasing agent for the federal government.

Under this contract, which carries no ceiling on the amount of revenue the company can earn, all levels of government agencies and departments can purchase professional software and system engineering services from Sterling Software. The company is one of about 50 businesses awarded a contract under this program, administered by the GSA's Federal Supply Service.
